UANotificationResponse Class Reference

Inherits from NSObject
Declared in UANotificationResponse.h

Overview

Clone of UNNotificationResponse for iOS 8-9 support. Contains the user’s reponse to a notification.

Tasks

  •   actionIdentifier property
  •   responseText property
  •   notificationContent property
  •   response property
  • + notificationResponseWithNotificationInfo:actionIdentifier:responseText:
  • + notificationResponseWithUNNotificationResponse:

Properties

actionIdentifier

Action identifier for the response.

@property (nonatomic, copy, readonly) NSString *actionIdentifier

Declared In

UANotificationResponse.h

notificationContent

The UANotificationContent instance associated with the response.

@property (nonatomic, strong, readonly) UANotificationContent *notificationContent

Declared In

UANotificationResponse.h

response

The UNNotificationResponse that generated the UANotificationResponse. Note: Only available on iOS 10+. Will be nil otherwise.

@property (nonatomic, readonly, nullable, strong) UNNotificationResponse *response

Declared In

UANotificationResponse.h

responseText

String populated with any response text provided by the user.

@property (nonatomic, copy, readonly) NSString *responseText

Declared In

UANotificationResponse.h
